SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT a.shinSeq ,a.shinDate ,a.shinDateGa ,a.shinDelNy ,a.shinDateTimeReg ,a.shinDateTimeEdit ,a.insProduct_inspSeq ,a.customer_cmSeq ,a.insMember_insmSeq ,b.inspName ,c.cmName ,d.insmName
ORDER BY a.shinSeq DESC ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.shinSeq ,a.shinDate ,a.shinDateGa ,a.shinDelNy ,a.shinDateTimeReg ,a.shinDateTimeEdit ,a.insProduct_inspSeq ,a.customer_cmSeq ,a.insMember_insmSeq ,b.inspName ,c.cmName ,d.insmName FROM applicationShin AS a LEFT JOIN insProduct AS b ON b.inspSeq = a.insProduct_inspSeq LEFT JOIN customer AS c ON c.cmSeq = a.customer_cmSeq LEFT JOIN insMember AS d ON d.insmSeq = a.insMember_insmSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.shinSeq = #{shinSeq}
SELECT a.inspSeq ,a.inspName FROM insProduct AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.inspDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.inspSeq DESC
SELECT a.cmSeq ,a.cmName FROM customer AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cmDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.cmSeq DESC
SELECT a.insmSeq ,a.insmName FROM insMember AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.insmDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.insmSeq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE applicationShin SET shinDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND shinSeq = #{shinSeq}
